column1: Little Goat Diner////I've been on somewhat of a Little Goat tear lately
column2: but I think it's still going to stay at 3 stars for me. Don't get me wrong
column3: the food is delicious for the most part
column4: but most of that deliciousness comes from copious amounts of fat and sugar
column6: I'm not a fan of super heavy food loaded with fat and sugar.
